title: Deshaun Watson Suspension Reaction
description:
Nora, Lindsay, and Kevin share their thoughts on the six-game suspension handed down to Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson and discuss the possibility of the NFL filing an appeal in the coming days.
Hosts: Nora Princiotti, Lindsay Jones, Kevin Clark
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
Additional Production Supervision: Conor Nevins and Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
